医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新公式预测红细胞的氧气输送能力科学家们开发出了一种通过测量红细胞形状来评估红细胞输送氧气的能力的方法。该测试可以改善专业移植和输血实践以及血库。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/New-formula-predicts-oxygen-delivery-ability-of-red-blood-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/New-formula-predicts-oxygen-delivery-ability-of-red-blood-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1dbe59a-59a1-478c-8a0a-061669ebef05 Sun, 22 Dec 2024 23:45:00 -0500 New formula predicts oxygen delivery ability of red blood cells
右美沙芬被发现具有治疗肺纤维化的潜力许多止咳糖浆中常见的非处方成分可能对患有肺纤维化的人有更大的用途，肺纤维化与许多严重的健康状况有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/Dextromethorphan-found-to-have-pottial-in-treating-lung-太多纤维化.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/Dextromethorphan-found-to-have-potial-in-treating-lung-太多纤维化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=add5f2c4-598f-4b09-9bcf-9f79b1c81c8f Sun, 22 Dec 2024 23:29:00 -0500 Dextromethorphan found to have potential in treating lung fibrosis
简单的设备可能会改变哮喘患者的游戏规则曼彻斯特大学一位教授帮助他的儿子使用吸入器的想法提出了一种成本仅为几美分的设备，它可能会改变哮喘患者的游戏规则。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/Simple-device-could-be-a-gamechanger-for-asthma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/Simple-device-could-be-a-gamechanger-for-asthma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17eae517-e2a8-44cb-ae21-097cea6d6860 Sun, 22 Dec 2024 23:27:00 -0500 Simple device could be a gamechanger for asthma patients
心灵在减肥和长期成功中的力量2024 年很容易被称为 Ozempic 年，但从长远来看，现在霍利伍德著名药物的负面影响可能远远超过正面影响。确实，我们许多人需要的是我们的思想力量来减肥并永远保持体重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/The-power-of-the-mind-in-weight-loss-and-long-term-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/The-power-of-the-mind-in-weight-loss-and-long-term-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1a64ecd-6dff-4de7-8d28-2224fe5ab51b Sun, 22 Dec 2024 23:08:00 -0500 The power of the mind in weight loss and long-term success
空间衰老时钟揭示 T 细胞和神经干细胞如何影响大脑衰老研究人员开发了空间衰老时钟来绘制脑细胞衰老图，揭示 T 细胞如何加速衰老以及 NSC 如何使邻近细胞恢复活力，从而为大脑健康和干预提供新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/Spatial-aging-clocks-reveal-how-T-cells-and-neural-stem-cells-shape-brain-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/Spatial-aging-clocks-reveal-how-T-cells-and-neural-stem-cells-shape-brain-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c812699c-8936-4b5e-93a4-5350845c388f Sun, 22 Dec 2024 19:16:00 -0500 Spatial aging clocks reveal how T cells and neural stem cells shape brain aging
胰岛素降解被发现是耐药性的新驱动因素研究人员发现，胰岛素抵抗可能是由血液中胰岛素降解引起的，这挑战了细胞缺陷是主要原因的观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/Insulin-degradation-uncovered-as-a-new-driver-of-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/Insulin-degradation-uncovered-as-a-new-driver-of-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4329bfd5-6e73-4b25-a17c-5dd20424f6c0 Sun, 22 Dec 2024 19:00:00 -0500 Insulin degradation uncovered as a new driver of resistance
通过对 AlphaFold2 模型的对抗性攻击生成突变蛋白质宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。蛋白质是重要的大分子，根据其构象动力学发挥功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241221/Generate-mutated- Proteins-through-adversarial-attacks-on-the-AlphaFold2-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241221/Generate-mutated- Proteins-through-adversarial-attacks-on-the-AlphaFold2-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4526f8ec-714c-4c10-92df-fdfd41df4167 Sat, 21 Dec 2024 23:04:12 -0500 Generating mutated proteins through adversarial attacks on the AlphaFold2 model
通过关系社区参与推进优质综合卫生服务与卡塔尔教育、科学和社区发展基金会 (QF) 合作编写了一份题为“社区参与的相关性：其在人性化医疗保健和实现优质综合卫生服务中的作用”的新报告，并在第七届世界卫生大会上发布。世界健康创新峰会 (WISH) 将于 2024 年 11 月 13 日至 14 日在多哈举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241221/Advancing-quality-integrated-health-services-through-relational-community-engagement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241221/Advancing-quality-integrated-health-services-through-relational-community-engagement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de740fbe-c057-4240-9238-e27ecc7d74b5 Sat, 21 Dec 2024 22:55:23 -0500 Advancing quality integrated health services through relational community engagement
新的类皮肤材料可能会彻底改变感染测试据报道，在假日电影《圣诞怪杰》中，化妆师每天花费几个小时用假肢包裹金凯瑞的脸，打造出标志性的脾气暴躁、绿毛生物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/New-skin-like-material-could-revolutionize-infection-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/New-skin-like-material-could-revolutionize-infection-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d93b95e9-389b-4c9f-b0b1-573df7b0c933 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 22:37:00 -0500 New skin-like material could revolutionize infection testing
新的研究项目旨在揭示疟疾最致命菌株背后的分子因素世界上近一半的人口生活在疟疾流行地区，恶性疟原虫造成的全球疟疾相关死亡人数约占 95%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/New-research-project-aims-to-uncover-molecular-factors-behind-malariae28099s-deadliest-strain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/New-research-project-aims-to-uncover-molecular-factors-behind-malariae28099s-deadliest-strain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f8e67dd-b7da-4afd-bf74-dac9e780c49a Fri, 20 Dec 2024 22:28:00 -0500 New research project aims to uncover molecular factors behind malaria’s deadliest strain
